page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT/ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content:
Hairdressers Employs 2 people sells hair treatment and makeup. KINGSHEAD Owner the brewery sells drinks and meals Employs 5 people. Harbors owner Mr Harbor sells food and other things Employs 4 people.
ART AND CRAFTS Thornham Craft Shop The man from the craft shops wife makes bead bracelets and necklaces.There is another lady in Thornham that makes pegdolls.She lives at Dale House. The lady that, makes pegdolls makes them out of straw and wood and the clothes come from old clothes.
